args.natural_language_statement: Let X be a topological space and A a closed subset of X. If X is normal then the subspace A (with the subspace topology) is normal. Translate this statement to Lean4 (Mathlib4). End the Lean statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Topology Set

/-- A closed subspace of a normal space is normal. -/
theorem Munkres_exercise_32_1 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] (A : Set X)
  (hX : NormalSpace X) (hA : IsClosed A) : NormalSpace A := by
  sorry
